alert.note: Alert for Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:25PM EDT until May 25 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR EASTERN ALLEN COUNTY... At 725 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Haven, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne, New Haven, Woodburn, Monroeville, Grabill, Leo-cedarville, Middletown, Harlan, Edgerton In Allen County, Zulu, Maples, Cuba, Hoagland, Tillman and Townley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 between mile markers 13 and 30. Interstate 69 in Indiana near mile marker 320. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
